item.title: Clustering G-means that automatically determines the number of clusters
item.description: This article is the 6th day entry for [Advent Calendar 2019 for Freee People](https://adventar.org/calendars/4414). I started writing in the middle of the night the day before and I was writing while saying hi-hee. #Introduction Do you all know the library PyClustering?PyClusteringisaclustering-specificlibraryavailablefromPythonandC++.ThealgorithmcalledG-meansisnewlyimplementedinsuchPyClusteringv0.9.2. I saw the name G-means for the first time + I couldn’t find an article in Japanese, so I looked it up and put it together. The algorithm itself is simple, so it may be easiest to read Paper directly.
